alert.note: Alert for Central Oahu; East Honolulu; Ewa Plain; Honolulu Metro; Kauai East; Kauai North; Kauai South; Koolau Leeward; Koolau Windward; Waianae Mountains (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 21 at 3:11AM HST until February 22 at 8:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR NIIHAU...KAUAI...AND OAHU THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Niihau, Kauai, and Oahu. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flood prone roads and other low lying areas may be closed due to elevated runoff and overflowing streams. Urban areas may receive more significant flooding and property damage due to rapid runoff. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Deepening low pressure west of the state will produce an increase in heavy showers and thunderstorms over the western end of the state through this afternoon. Given that soils are already saturated and streams elevated, flash flooding may develop anywhere, especially over the island of Kauai.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
